definition.description: Execution goal for validating a Virtual Client version for production readiness.

metadata.intent: Qualify Virtual Client for Production Release

meta.unexpectedCondtions: summarize avg(MetricValue) by MetricName | where avg_MetricValue >1000 and avg_MetricValue < 2000

experiment.name: $.parameters.experiment.name
experiment.description: QoS experiment to validate the working order of a Virtual Client version.

workflow.name: Create Virtual Machines
workflow.description: Create virtual machines to run workloads for experiment Group A.

workflow.name: Install Juno Guest Agent
workflow.description: Installs the Juno Guest agent on the VMs for group A.

workflow.name: Run VirtualClient Workload
workflow.description: Run performance and IO workload on the VMs for group A

dependencies.name: Virtual Client NuGet Package
dependencies.description: Download the Virtual Client NuGet package to the VM.

workflow.name: Cleanup VM Resources
workflow.description: Cleanup VMs and related Azure subscription resources.
